name: Dr. Gauri Agarwal
subtitle: Founder & Chief IVF Specialist
description: Dr. Gauri Agarwal is a young, dynamic, and leading fertility specialist of Delhi/NCR. Dr. Agarwal is backed by visionary thinking, die-hard determination, and industry-rich experience of more than 10 years. She is the Director, IVF at Seeds of Innocence Centre. Dr. Agarwal finished her MBBS degree from Bharati Vidyapeeth Medical College, Pune. Post that, she did a Diplomate of National Board (DNB), Obstetrics and Gynaecology Residency Program from KG Superspecialty Hospital, Coimbatore. She followed this with a hard-earned Fellowship Program in Reproductive Medicine (Infertility) from the University of Gent, Belgium. Further, she received training in Embryology at the National University of Singapore.
qualification: MD, DNB, MBBS
specialization: IVF, Reproductive Endocrinology, Advanced Fertility Techniques
workExperience: Founder & Director at Seeds of Innocence (India, Oman & Africa).
Leading Gynecologist and highly respected IVF specialist with over 15 years of experience in Advanced Infertility Treatment & Reproductive Genetics.
education: Trained in Embryology at the National University of Singapore
Fellowship in IVF & ART from Ghent University, Belgium
Stanford University Graduate: School of Business
FDGSI Fertility Specialist
awards: The coveted Business World Healthcare 40 under 40 Leaders in India 2022
The prestigious Times 40 under 40 Healthcare Leaders in India 2022
The ET Healthworld: Induction into the Hall of Fame as the IVF Virtuoso of 2022

name: Dr. Aditi Bhatnagar
subtitle: Senior IVF Specialist
description: Dr. Aditi Bhatnagar is a highly experienced IVF specialist with expertise in advanced reproductive medicine. She specializes in complex infertility cases, recurrent implantation failures, and personalized IVF protocols.

With a patient-centric approach, Dr. Bhatnagar ensures that each couple receives individualized care tailored to their specific needs. Her commitment to excellence and compassionate care has helped numerous couples achieve successful pregnancies.
She stays updated with the latest advancements in fertility medicine and is actively involved in research to improve success rates and patient outcomes.
qualification: MBBS, MD (Obstetrics & Gynecology), Fellowship in IVF
specialization: IVF, ICSI, Advanced Reproductive Techniques

name: Dr. Nivedita Nehal
subtitle: Senior IVF Specialist
description: Dr. Nivedita Nehal is a highly skilled and dedicated specialist in the field of obstetrics & gynecology. She is an expert in her field and brings a profound wealth of knowledge. She is working as an IVF Specialist at Seeds of Innocens IVF in Gorakhpur.
qualification: MBBS, MS (Obstetrics & Gynecology)
specialization: IVF, PCOS Management, Hormonal Disorders
workExperience: With more than 05 years of experience, she has a strong background and knowledge in gynecology and reproductive medicine. She served as a senior resident at AIIMS Bhopal.
She did her fellowship in reproductive medicine from Ferty9 Hyderabad. And also served as an IVF consultant in Ferty9 Hyderabad.
education: She has completed her MBBS from Era Medical College, Lucknow, and MS in Obstetrics and Gynecology from DY Patil Medical College, Kolhapur. Additionally, she did her fellowships in fetal sonography, infertility, and hysteroscopy. She has also registered and earned a Medical Registration certificate from the Medical Council, Madhya Pradesh.

Thereafter joined an IVF centre and am working specifically to provide fertility evaluation and advanced infertility treatment. She is known for her holistic & patient-centric care with individualized treatment protocols.
